metadata.h1: Olive Garden Kids Menu 2025: What Will Your Picky Eater Love?
metadata.description: Got kids? We've got the full Olive Garden Kids Menu for 2025! See every kid-approved pasta, pizza, and chicken dish with prices. Make dinner easy!

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: Taking the little ones to Olive Garden? They're in for a treat! ðŸ§’ The Olive Garden Kids Menu is packed with yummy, kid-approved meals that are perfect for smaller appetites. No more dinner-time battles! From classic pasta to pizza, there's something for every picky eater. Let's find their new favorite! âœ¨

data.title: Your Kids Menu Questions, Answered! ðŸ¤”

items.question: What age is the Olive Garden Kids Menu for?
items.answer: The kids menu is specially designed for the little ones aged 12 and under! Perfect portions for perfect kids.

items.question: Do kids' meals come with a drink and side?
items.answer: They sure do! Every kids' meal gets a choice of a side (like grapes or broccoli) and a drink (like 1% low-fat milk). It's a complete meal deal! ðŸ’¯

items.question: Are there gluten-free options on the kids menu?
items.answer: Yes! Olive Garden has gluten-sensitive options for kids, like the Rotini with Marinara or Meat Sauce made with gluten-free pasta. Just let your server know!

items.question: Do kids get the unlimited breadsticks and salad too?
items.answer: The famous unlimited breadsticks are for everyone at the table to enjoy, including the kids! The unlimited salad, however, is typically included with the purchase of an adult entrÃ©e.

items.question: Can an adult order from the kids menu?
items.answer: While the kids menu is designed for guests 12 and under, some locations may allow an adult to order from it for a smaller portion. This is handled on a case-by-case basis, so it's always best to ask your server politely. ðŸ˜Š
